prompt: Explain how one of their goals has changed over time
example_question1: Once you realized that was unrealistic, what did you do?
example_question2: How did your goals change once you realized the financial implications?

prompt: Describe an obstacle they expect to face, related to one of their aspirations
example_question1: What might prevent you from achieving that?
example_question2: What will you have to give up to accomplish that?

prompt: Describe what their goals will be once they achieve a current call
example_question2: What new capabilities would that achievement grant you?
